name: Orbic Helicopters
about: Orbic Helicopters, established in 1990, is a premier helicopter flight school and service provider based at the Camarillo Airport in Southern California. Founded by Ken Obi, a seasoned pilot with over 18,000 flight hours, the company is dedicated to providing high-quality, practical flight training. Orbic offers a range of services including private pilot licenses, commercial pilot certificates, instrument ratings, and certified flight instructor training. The school is known for its highly experienced instructors and well-maintained fleet of Robinson helicopters. In addition to flight training, Orbic Helicopters provides scenic tours, photo flights, charter services, and maintenance as a Federal Aviation Administration-approved part 145 repair station. With a strong focus on safety and customer satisfaction, Orbic Helicopters has built a reputation for producing highly trained and confident pilots.
